entry.title: $1734 // Beautiful and Bright Apt Rental in Astoria/LIC
entry.content:
My husband and I are looking for a couple or single person for a sublet or lease take over for our fantastic apt In Astoria. 1br with huge eat in kitchen, large living room, and bathroom with tub. Rent is $1734 a month plus 1 month security deposit (May or may not need fee for credit check depending on sublet or lease take over). We are open to selling off some of our furniture as well since we will be moving out of state but that can be negotiated. Please be able to provide proof of income upon request and feel free to contact if interested or with any questions/concerns you may have.

*these pictures are from the original listing when we rented the place a year an a half ago. We have updated pictures upon request but prefer not to post publically.
